message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this incredible product. I know it would be a valuable asset to you.  Given its potential, I'm offering it at $1,150,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. While I recognize the value of the product, that price point is a little high for me. I'd be willing to pay $900,000.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but the value of this product to you is significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,100,000.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be honest, $1,000,000 is the highest I can go.  I understand if that doesn't work for you.
